0: Would return to try the pool and spa
Not much of garden space for children inside hotelI wish our child was allowed to the pool indoor pool
I say feature but it is no more than a shallow rectangular area of water
Mosquitoes are a problem here as there are two large shallow stagnant ponds at the front of the hotel my friend got 10 bites within an hour of sitting out on the deck having dinner
1: Wetried the roof top pool and the spa both of which were lovely
There are two pools both rooftop one of which is part of the spa centre is an amazing experience
We spent many days lounging up on the Spa Deck inside pool
The pools are also free along with the steam rooms and the sauna
The room was very spacious with a soothing view of a water pool
Good quality rooms very good facilities really excellent breakfast experience good pool area
One can swim in the pool use the steam rooms and sauna and then sunbathe on the large deck
The hotel remains very nice with amazing sea views from the rooms on the sea front a nice sand beach and a nice swimming pool on the deck
The swimming pool is very family friendly and it has a pool bar
